import{api}from'./api';export const orderAPI={createOrder:async orderData=>{const response=await api.post('/orders',orderData);return response.data;},getUserOrders:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/orders/my-orders');return response.data;},// --- Admin Functions ---
getAllOrders:async(page,limit,status)=>{const response=await api.get('/orders',{params:{page,limit,status}});return response.data;},getOrderById:async id=>{const response=await api.get(`/orders/${id}`);return response.data;},updateOrderStatus:async(id,status)=>{const response=await api.patch(`/orders/${id}/status`,{status});return response.data;}};
